content.question: Which of the following arguments about Reconstruction policies would both authors most likely disagree with?

choices.label: White Southerners across all economic classes rejected Reconstruction policies.
With Republicans in retreat, Southern Democrats grew more supportive of Reconstruction policies.
Reconstruction policies failed to prevent the spread of violence against formerly enslaved people.
Unfair labor conditions in the South persisted despite Reconstruction policies.

content.answer: With Republicans in retreat, Southern Democrats grew more supportive of Reconstruction policies.

skill.text: Skill 3.C: Compare the arguments or main ideas of two sources.
